item.title: 鲍威尔调查如何可能打乱特朗普的美联储计划
item.description:
备受争议的刑事调查引发了共和党罕见的反对声浪。这可能使鲍威尔在美联储的任期延长，同时降低降息的可能性。【原文：

The much-criticized criminal inquiry triggered some rare GOP pushback. It may leave Powell at the Fed for longer while making rate cuts less likely.

】

item.title: 监管机构称网络安全漏洞影响75万加拿大投资者
item.description: 加拿大投资监管机构在关于8月披露重大数据泄露事件后续影响的更新中称，约75万加拿大投资者的个人信息受到"复杂网络钓鱼攻击"的影响。【原文：Personal information of about 750,000 Canadian investors has been impacted by a “sophisticated phishing attack,” according to the Canadian Investment Regulatory Organization, in an update on the fallout from a major breach disclosed in August.】

item.title: 美国对部分芯片销售征收25%关税，作为英伟达交易的一部分
item.description: 美国对部分半导体产品加征25%关税，这是特朗普总统批准的一项协议中的关键步骤，该协议允许英伟达公司向中国出口台湾制造的H200人工智能处理器。【原文：The US imposed a 25% tariff on imports of certain semiconductors, a key step in an agreement blessed by President Donald Trump allowing Nvidia Corp. to ship Taiwan-made H200 artificial intelligence processors to China.】

item.title: OpenAI与Cerebras达成100亿美元协议，用于人工智能计算
item.description: OpenAI与Cerebras Systems公司签署了多年期协议，将使用其硬件提供750兆瓦的计算能力，此次合作将助力该公司快速扩展人工智能基础设施。【原文：OpenAI signed a multiyear deal to use hardware from Cerebras Systems Inc. for 750 megawatts’ worth of computing power, an alliance that will support the company’s rapid build-out of AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 特朗普就伊朗抗议发表最新言论后油价下跌
item.description: 油价下跌，抹去了早盘涨幅。此前美国总统特朗普表示，他已得到保证伊朗将停止镇压抗议者，这表明他可能暂缓对伊朗镇压大规模示威活动采取威胁中的军事回应。【原文：Oil fell, erasing earlier gains, after President Donald Trump said he had been assured that Iran would stop killing protesters, in a signal he could hold off on a threatened military response to the repression of widespread demonstrations in the nation.】

item.title: 私募股权公司竞相收购大众旗下60亿欧元Everllence业务单元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着德国汽车制造商大众汽车推进资产处置计划，其旗下重型柴油发动机部门Everllence SE的多数股权正吸引多家私募股权公司的关注。【原文：A majority stake in Volkswagen AG’s heavy diesel engine unit Everllence SE is attracting interest from a number of private equity firms, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German automaker proceeds with its asset disposal program.】

item.title: 美联储褐皮书显示经济回暖，就业持平
item.description: 美联储在《褐皮书》的地区经济调查报告中指出，自11月中旬以来，美国大部分地区经济活动以"轻微至温和"的速度回升。【原文：Economic activity picked up at a “slight to modest pace” in most parts of the US since mid-November, the Federal Reserve said in its Beige Book survey of regional contacts.】

item.title: 美国关键电网机构下调需求预期，因人工智能热潮被过度夸大
item.description: 美国最大的电网运营商下调了电力需求增长预期，为人工智能热潮中的狂热提供了现实检验。【原文：The biggest US grid operator dialed back its forecast for power demand growth, offering a reality check to the frenzy around the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 美国原油相对于布伦特原油的折扣扩大，因区域供应格局发生转变
item.description: 美国原油相对于全球基准布伦特原油的交易价差已达15个月来最大，从委内瑞拉到黑海地区的地缘政治动荡正冲击着全球供应链。【原文：US oil is trading at the deepest discount to the global Brent benchmark in 15 months as geopolitical developments from Venezuela to the Black Sea shake up supply flows around the world.】

item.title: 陷入困境的巴西投资者被迫出售其王冠上的明珠股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西资深投资者纳尔逊·塔努雷为偿还债权人，已放弃其帝国中被视为皇冠明珠的石油公司几乎全部股权。【原文：Veteran Brazilian investor Nelson Tanure gave up almost all of his stake in an oil company seen as the crown jewel of his empire in order to pay back creditors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特阿美支持的MidOcean公司正洽谈加入阿根廷液化天然气项目
item.description: 知情人士透露，由EIG Partners创立的液化天然气公司MidOcean Energy LLC正就加入阿根廷标志性液化天然气项目进行磋商。【原文：MidOcean Energy LLC, a liquefied natural gas company founded by EIG Partners, is in talks to join Argentina’s signature LNG venture, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 凯雷集团的施瓦茨称美联储独立性"极其重要"
item.description: 凯雷集团首席执行官哈维·施瓦茨表示，对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的调查凸显了美国央行独立性的重要性。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz said that an investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell underscores the importance of the US central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 中国禁止美国和以色列顶级安全公司的网络产品
item.description: 据彭博新闻社获得的一份政府指令显示，中国已要求国内企业不得使用美国和以色列公司的网络安全产品，涉及企业包括Palo Alto Networks Inc.、Fortinet Inc.和Check Point Software Technologies Ltd.。【原文：China has instructed companies in the country not to use cybersecurity products from American and Israeli firms including Palo Alto Networks Inc., Fortinet Inc. and Check Point Software Technologies Ltd., according to a government directive seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 高盛以11亿美元违约金收购洛杉矶著名电影制片厂
item.description: 高盛集团正牵头收购洛杉矶一家历史悠久的影视制片厂，此前该厂所有者哈克曼资本合伙公司未能偿还11亿美元抵押贷款。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is leading a takeover of a historic Los Angeles studio lot after the owner, Hackman Capital Partners, defaulted on a $1.1 billion mortgage.】

item.title: 德国副总理称特朗普在美联储问题上冒险可能适得其反
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯·克林格贝尔表示，唐纳德·特朗普的政治路线可能适得其反，并敦促欧洲不要将其对美联储施压的做法作为处理央行关系的模板。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said Donald Trump’s political course risks backfiring and urged Europe not to take his pressure on the Federal Reserve as a model for dealing with central banks.】

item.title: Verizon用户报告服务中断，影响数千人
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司正遭遇大范围服务中断，周三下午数千名用户报告手机信号中断。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is suffering a widespread service outage, with thousands of users reporting lack of cell service on Wednesday afternoon.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下xAI公司因Grok生成性内容遭加州总检察长调查
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克的人工智能初创公司xAI正受到加州总检察长办公室的调查，此前该公司旗下的Grok聊天机器人被指控未经同意就生成数千张女性和儿童的色情图像。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup, xAI, is under investigation by the California attorney general’s office after the company’s Grok chatbot was allegedly used to create thousands of sexualized images of women and children without their consent.】

item.title: 花旗集团第四季度财报五大看点
item.description: 以下是花旗集团第四季度财报的亮点。更多详情请点击此处查看我们的TOPLive博客。【原文：Here’s what we saw in Citigroup Inc.’s fourth-quarter earnings. For more, click here for our TOPLive blog.】

item.title: 特朗普的信用卡威胁为华尔街的盈利狂欢蒙上阴影
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫引发市场大涨，交易活动进入高速运转状态，银行家们拥抱特朗普的一切政策以赚取巨额利润。【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House unleashed a market rally, dealmaking went into overdrive, and bankers embraced all things Trump to rake in the big money.】

item.title: 英国央行拉姆斯登称需对对冲基金的英国国债杠杆采取行动
item.description: 英国央行副行长戴夫·拉姆斯登表示，英国需要采取行动应对对冲基金在英国国债市场积累的杠杆规模，此举释放出明确信号，表明官员们希望加强监管力度。【原文：The UK needs to take action on how much leverage has been accumulated by hedge funds in the gilt market, said Bank of England deputy governor Dave Ramsden, sending a clear signal that officials want to enforce greater oversight.】

item.title: 美国国债30年期收益率在避险需求推动下延续跌势
item.description: 美国国债价格上涨，推动30年期国债收益率降至今年迄今最低水平，这主要受到避险需求和债券供应因素的共同影响。【原文：A rise in US Treasuries pushed the 30-year bond’s yield to the lowest level so far this year amid haven demand and bond supply considerations.】

item.title: 2026年矿业股攀升，投资者追逐避风港
item.description: 矿业股在年初大幅上涨，此前黄金、白银和铜价周三均创下历史新高，延续了由地缘政治紧张局势和避险资产需求回升推动的涨势。【原文：Mining stocks jumped at the start of the year after gold, silver and copper all hit record highs Wednesday, extending a rally fueled by geopolitical tension and renewed demand for safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 高风险借款人涌入市场，借投资者对收益的渴求之机
item.description: 尽管大盘对每一次政治动荡都反应激烈，高风险债务市场却表现得仿佛一切正常。【原文：While the broader markets have flinched at every political tremor, the world of risky debt is acting like almost nothing’s wrong.】

item.title: 微软关闭协助诈骗者窃取数百万美元的诈骗网站
item.description: 攻击者利用了盗版软件。【原文：Attackers leveraged pirated software.】

item.title: 台湾官员赴华盛顿推进贸易协定
item.description: 据知情人士透露，台湾高层官员正前往华盛顿，旨在推动一项长期搁置的协议——该协议旨在降低美国对这个自治岛屿出口商品的关税，并促进对美国的投资。【原文：Top Taiwanese officials are traveling to Washington to advance a long-stalled agreement to lower US tariffs on the self-governing island’s exports and boost investment in America, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国执政党社民党批评汉莎航空与马斯克的星链达成协议
item.description: 德国执政联盟中的社会民主党批评德国汉莎航空公司与埃隆·马斯克支持的SpaceX公司达成使用星链卫星互联网网络的协议，称其本应选择德国电信等本土运营商。【原文：Germany’s co-ruling Social Democrats criticized Deutsche Lufthansa AG over its deal to use Elon Musk-backed SpaceX’s Starlink satellite internet network, saying it should have chosen a domestic operator like Deutsche Telekom AG.】

item.title: 比尔特推出10%封顶信用卡，响应特朗普要求
item.description: 比尔特奖励计划正推出三款新信用卡，利率上限为10%，此举发生在特朗普总统威胁未采取此措施的贷款机构数日之后。【原文：Bilt Rewards is unveiling three new credit cards with interest rates capped at 10%, days after President Donald Trump threatened lenders that failed to do so.】

item.title: 纽约市称DoorDash和优步司机被克扣5.5亿美元小费
item.description: 据纽约市机构发布的报告显示，DoorDash公司和优步科技公司通过更改应用程序界面，已剥夺纽约外卖配送员超过5.5亿美元的小费收入。【原文：DoorDash Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc. have deprived New York delivery workers of more than $550 million in tips after changing the interfaces on their apps, according to findings released in a report from a city agency.】

item.title: 英格兰银行或将把稳定币视同银行存款予以保护，拉姆斯登表示
item.description: 英国央行官员戴夫·拉姆斯登表示，英国可能需要像保障民众在银行的常规储蓄一样，为稳定币存款提供担保。【原文：Britain may need to back up stablecoin deposits in the same way that it guarantees people’s regular savings in banks, according to Bank of England official Dave Ramsden.】
